text: [Music]
my name is Kevin Fleming I'm a head of
open source and technology community
engagement at Bloomberg in New York so
Bloomberg is a financial data and
information services provider to
hundreds of thousands of users around
the world technology is important to
Bloomberg because the company was
founded to provide transparency in a
trading market that didn't have any and
technology hadn't been previously
applied to solve that problem so the
founders of our company did Bloomberg
processes data from hundreds of market
exchanges around the world thousands of
new sources around the world tens of
thousands of pricing contributors around
the world and all of that data needs to
be delivered to our customers as rapidly
as it possibly can be and being able to
deploy that rapidly is fundamental to
the services we provide our focus on
evaluating and deploying cloud native
technologies is all about improving
developer productivity and efficiency we
need to allow them the ability to focus
on their applications where their data
science experiments or whatever other
tools they are working on without having
to worry about the infrastructure that
will be used to deploy them we're happy
to see that kubernetes and Prometheus
and many other tools all fall into the
purview of the CNC F so with previous
generations of technologies our
application developers had to be aware
of how the infrastructure operated so
that they could properly express the
requirements of their application to
provide resilience and fault tolerance
and other needs with kubernetes were
able to actually express those
requirements directly to the
orchestration platform so that it can
handle those needs for us the ability to
move applications to an orchestration
platform that will let us more
efficiently use all of our resources is
fundamental to our ability to grow and
meet the demands from our clients one of
the reasons that we joined CNC f as an
end-user community member is it gives us
the ability to participate in
conversations among the end-user team
members but those then lead to the
ability to participate in the technical
Oversight Committee which defines the
future direction of the project and
that's very important for us to have a
voice
[Music]
you
